name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a dedicated Senior Sales Engineer with a strong emphasis on Cybersecurity solutions, I bring extensive knowledge in Cloud Security, SASE, Proxy, IPS, DLP, CASB, and CNAPP. With 8 years of experience in the tech industry, I leverage my technical acumen to drive value selling through effective presentations and demonstrations, aiding clients in understanding the importance of robust security practices. My hands-on experience with compliance standards, including CISSP and CCNP, enhances my ability to deliver tailored security solutions that meet complex enterprise needs.

In my previous role as a Full Stack Developer, I specialized in building high-performance applications across healthcare and financial sectors, utilizing modern **JavaScript/TypeScript, Python**, and **Flutter** technologies. My technical background includes **React, Next.js, Vue, Node.js, FastAPI**, and **Django**, complemented by cloud expertise in **Azure** and **AWS**. I have a proven track record of leading the development of platforms that integrate AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics and intelligent automation. My strong foundation in microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation allows me to create secure and compliant applications efficiently.
